about.summary: The ECMWF API for encoding and decoding WMO FM-92 GRIB edition 1 and edition 2 messages.

name: python-ecmwf_grib
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.15.0" %}

package:
    name: python-ecmwf_grib
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: grib_api-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://software.ecmwf.int/wiki/download/attachments/3473437/grib_api-{{ version }}-Source.tar.gz
    md5: df1e3779df73d09570c338ebe46341cf
    patches:
      - gribapi_py3k.patch  # [py3k]
      - right_python.patch  # [py3k and osx]

build:
    number: 0
    skip: True  # [win]
    detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true

requirements:
    build:
        - cmake
        - python
        - numpy x.x
        - jasper
        - libpng >=1.6.21,<1.7
        - libnetcdf 4.4.*
        - ecmwf_grib {{ version }}
    run:
        - python
        - numpy x.x
        - jasper
        - libpng >=1.6.21,<1.7
        - libnetcdf 4.4.*
        - ecmwf_grib {{ version }}

test:
    imports:
        - gribapi

about:
    home: https://software.ecmwf.int/wiki/display/GRIB/Home
    license: Apache-2.0
    summary: The ECMWF API for encoding and decoding WMO FM-92 GRIB edition 1 and edition 2 messages.

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - pelson
        - rhattersley
        - ocefpaf
        - kmuehlbauer
